sourcesContent:
<template>
 
   <MovieCard v-for="(a,i) in 9" :key="i" :title="title" :poster="poster"/>
   
   
 
  
</template>

<script> 
import axios from 'axios'
import MovieCard from './components/MovieCard.vue'

export default {
  
  name: 'App',
  data(){
  return {
       title : '',
       released : '',
       genre : '',
       writer : '',
       poster : ''
  }
 
  },
  created(){
    const apiKey = 'fac1af98'
    const id = 'tt3896198'
    let mtitle = 'city';
let titlebox = this.title
    // http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=[yourkey]&/
    // http://www.omdbapi.com/?i=tt3896198&apikey=fac1af98
 axios.get(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?i=${id}&apikey=${apiKey}&s=${mtitle}`).then( 결과 => {
   for(let i = 0; i < 결과.data.Search.length; i++){
  titlebox.push(결과.data.Search[i].Title) // 영화 제목
  this.released = 결과.data.Search[i].Released; // 영화 출시일
  this.genre = 결과.data.Search[i].Genre; // 영화 장르
  this.writer = 결과.data.Search[i].Writer; // 영화 등장인물
  this.poster = 결과.data.Search[i].Poster; // 영화 포스터

 
  }
    console.log(결과)
    console.log(this.title)
  })
  },
  
  components: { 
    MovieCard
    },
 
}
 


  

</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
